title: I Reincarnated as a Villainess, but I Become a Gorimacho and Avoid Engagement - Novel Updates
tags: European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Knights   Nobles   Reincarnated in Another World   Short Story   Time Skip   Tomboyish Female Lead   Villainess Noble Girls
author: [email protected] Kapu Suishintou   さや@異種カプ推進党
description:
A former Japanese woman who was reincarnated as the villainous daughter of a certain anime avoids her engagement to the first prince by becoming gorimacho.

After getting her freedom, she goes out into society again in search of a partner who will love her even if she is gori and macho.
>
